entry.title: What to Expect
entry.summary:
Author: Kharismatic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,929Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: Jason Todd never knew what to expect when he met you‚Äîbut it certainly wasn‚Äôt you getting pregnant. He managed to keep both you and the pregnancy a secret from his family, determined to protect you from the chaos that came with his life. For months, he carried the weight of it alone. But secrets don‚Äôt last forever in the Batfamily. When a rogue villain possibly learn their secret identities, the safest option is to stay at the manor. Now Jason has no choice but to bring you and the baby into the very heart of the family‚Äîwho don‚Äôt even know either of you exist.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,289Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 63

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony‚Ä¶ until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,639Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 396

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: <DC Oneshots>
entry.summary:
Author: AttractiveUrchin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,893Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 49

Summary: A collection of DC X readers, Ranging from Superboy to Red Hood, all characters that have been written for or will be are tagged below. If a character is younger, there will be no sexual elements to that individual story, unless aged up. All of these are one-shots and will be updated frequently. Check out my MARVEL or Animation books :)Requests allowed!(Scroll a bit for rules)1) I can deny any request (Obviously), usually this is because I don't know a character/media well enough to write for it.2) After completing a request, I'll likely delete the original comment and replace it with one of my own- request, title, requester, ex.3) I typically only do ONE request per person!4) All requests are done in my free time, they do not take priority over current chapters!

entry.title: Inventors Of The Past
entry.summary:
Author: TheGhostInTheRoom

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,274Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: You could never claim to be a lady of the higher society, and you weren't going to start now. You've been a pirate, a thief, a rude woman. You would never willingly step foot into their courts. Regardless of the fact you now found yourself intermingled with the Wayne Family. Who was the highest of Society, and were currently making you step foot into their court. The ones who indirectly ruined your life, and the ones who would unfortunately become your savior. Especially when one seems to share the same goal as you. Killing the Crown Prince of Gotham. Prince Jack Napier.

entry.title: find me faceless
entry.summary:
Author: PunsandPoses

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,073Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 2,331

Summary: It wasn't like you were¬†stupid. No, you dotted your i's and crossed your t's and did all the shit that a citizen of a shit hole like¬†Gotham City¬†did. You carried a taser, kept out of alleys, travelled with a companion.And it had kept you (relatively) untraumatized for the entirety of the 21 years of your existence. Sure, you'd seen some gruesome things, but that was normal. You weren't the type that made a stupid decision and got screwed over. You were smart.Of course, that flew out the window with the goddamn¬†Red Hood¬†of all people. entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,593Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 99

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story‚Äîa quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting.At least, that‚Äôs what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns.No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she‚Äôs staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,383Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 36

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll find a way.‚Äù he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.
